website_summaries.verdict: A comprehensive kit with items that make it easy to adorn yourself with henna tattoos. We love that the paste is made of quality ingredients with no added chemicals.
pros: An updated kit with improved application bottles that make them easy to hold and control
2 bottles of brown henna paste included
Henna doesn't contain harsh ingredients and is organically sourced
Waterproof tattoos will last as long as 7 days
cons: Color could be a bit more pigmented
Cost falls on the higher end of the spectrum, but you get a lot of supplies for the price

customer_reviews.title: Bad allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product at first...so much that I put their logo on my leg... I think the pictures speak for themselves, not sure what happened. The rash didn’t begin until the henna started to fade, so a couple weeks after application. Heading to the doctor today to get it checked out. First photo was taken 7 days ago, last photo taken today. Not good! Just hoping it doesn’t scar.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun! There are lots of tips to choose from. The ink is pretty thick, so there is a learning curve to avoid blobs. It lasted longer than I expected. I had a temp tattoo from another company, and I applied this over the top. I added the crown. In the pic right after washing, you can see how light it starts out by looking at the crown. This kit was far less expensive than another one I considered buying. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Fox

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: decided to make a design on my arm with this product and followed the instructions exactly as it said to and i may be dealing with a permanent scar on my left on my due to the chemicals inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack s.

customer_reviews.title: Realistic looking, easy to use temporary tattoos
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product a lot. I used it to do a few doodles on myself for Project Semicolon (for awareness of suicide prevention). After application, the "tattoo" looks like a real, albeit faded, tattoo. This, to me, actually authenticates the appearance. Application is a little messy & takes an hour to set, there is a learning curve to applying the paste for the best results, and using the included tips required a bit of practice...but I get a nice "tattoo" that lasts a couple of weeks then fades away. A fun product that lets you know what a real tattoo might look like without the pain of a real needle.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Plaster

customer_reviews.title: Messy but nice
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use but highly messy. I suggest holding the bottle and changes tips with a tissue or paper towel to avoid finger staining. For me, the ink fist came out globby but shaking the botte helped. I'm including a pic of one I did after attempting another that turned out so-so. The one shown is better. This is after 2-3 days. I advise anyone to do bigger artwork. It seems to work better that way.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara GreerTop Contributor: Harry Potter

customer_reviews.title: Comes off very quickly
customer_reviews.text: The instructions say to leave the ink on to dry for 2 hours - which I did - but the ink on my wrist faded not even 3 days later and was completely gone after just a week. The ink on my ankle stayed a few days more because I didn't rub it as often. Make sure not to rub/scrub/wash the area because the ink comes right off. If you leave the ink on for more than 2 hours, perhaps the ink will stay on longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I like that ink stays on for a long time and it does exactly what it supposed to do and the tips are very helpful in keeping the lines clean. But remember the Inc. won’t last quite as long on your hand just because you wash your hands a lot, AND you must follow the instructions or you will be sorry ( or at least the kid who didn’t follow the wash the ink off after it has dried for an hour rule was, as he printed he Jesus fish off his arm and on to his face where it stayed for almost a month )
customer_reviews.author: Schneiderfam

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product caused a serious reaction which may scar. I am very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Misttique

customer_reviews.title: Causes allergic reaction and scarring
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Awful!!! read reviews that this may cause an allergic reaction, but I decided to take the risk which I regret so much. It was fine applying the tattoo to my skin- no reaction. After my tattoo started to fade, red bumps started to appear with an itch. Now it's literally a scar. Use at your own risk!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy ♡

customer_reviews.title: Dark and lasted 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I thought this kit was easy to use. I used the smallest attachment for the bottle of henna and the lines came out slightly thicker than I expected, but I had never done this before so I was still happy with the results. I was amazed at how dark it became just the next morning and it lasted 2 weeks. I was ready for it to be gone after a week and gave it some extra scrubbing in the shower to get rid of it faster. Worked as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: brittney

customer_reviews.title: Turns skin black instead of brown
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this at all, threw it away. Turns your skin black instead of a brown henna color.. missing the point here. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Byro

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t leave a mark
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours creating a really cool tattoo on my arm, followed all instructions, waited, and nothing. Not one mark. It just washed away. On the bright side, it did smell good. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Ken Ken

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids to doodles
customer_reviews.text: It really does what it says in the description. Although in the first few days it appeared black and then probably after 5th days it. Turned blue and fade out on maybe the 10th days. I actually enjoyed it my sister loved it and told me she would like this to be ordered again. I like that it gives different sizing of the needles but seem my sister only used one same needle.
customer_reviews.author: Christin cosuineau

customer_reviews.title: JUST GET IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product, it stains black and darker than most henna. It's absolutely easy to use, ready to go and sets quickly. Absolutely recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: commandercobalt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the summer! ..Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to try out tattoo placement and style before you get a real one! I had so much fun using this with my niece and daughter over the weekend. It lasts a long time (two weeks in some areas and slightly less in others). I had enough to make lots of designs. The kit came with everything I needed and was the best price for value I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah ensign

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the lines fine even with the fine tips. It didn't come out consistently. When it set it looked like I had used Sharpie to draw it. It was still fun.
customer_reviews.author: Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Got this to do cute henna because I'm going through some scary medical issues. ... my husband and son loved the idea so the three of us have matching tattoos. Love that there were different tips to control the flow. Bottle was a little hard to squeeze but honestly... a great product!
customer_reviews.author: RabidRodentMom

customer_reviews.title: absolute rip-off.
customer_reviews.text: I gave myself a henna tattoo and left it on for two hours before i even washed it off. it says you can rinse after 1 hour, and i waited double that to make sure. IT DIDNT EVEN SHOW UP. Its been three days and no outline whatsoever. Nothing. Like i never even put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Effective long lasting ink.
customer_reviews.text: This ink kit is great. It really is long lasting with the only downside, being it lasts a while so don't mess up!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but no tattoo showed up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit and then moved across the country, just now tried it out on 3 places on my body (arm, wrist and ankle) and none of them came out. Followed the directions and watched the video online. My 2 daughters also did them on themselves and you can barely see anything. It’s been 28 hours, so they should have shown up by now. Bought these to see if I’d like the placement for my real tattoo, but pretty disappointed in the end result. Tried to take a picture, but literally it looks like my plain old skin, so I didn’t post it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Livingston

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tattoo
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a temporary tattoo that looks real and easy to apply this is the product for you. So far it looks great (people actually think it's real) and was very easy to apply. Watch their instruction video, before attempting to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ohad B.

customer_reviews.title: Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for a trip to Disneyland; my siblings always ask for face paint but it's so expensive so we got this as an alternative. It was perfect! It was easy to use, no mess, and long lasting, and it didn't come off from sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Lack of instructions but still might be worth it
customer_reviews.text: Instructions included in the box weren’t really helpful, product itself was great though! Instructions didn’t explain how to use the tracing paper, I tried to transfer what I drew onto my skin but there were no instructions on how to so I guessed, but didn’t really get it so i winged it. Final product isn’t as sharp as I’d like but that’s what is expected with such a finicky material, but i wanted to test a future tattoo before committing and this was a great way!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tribble

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Lasts 2 weeks. Good for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I got it to use on my growing pregnant belly and it works wonderfully. It lasts about 2 weeks before it's nearly completely faded away. I have sensitive skin and can't even use my normal lotions right now, but this has not caused an skin irritation. Have used an entire bottle and ordering another today! Only complaint is it's difficult to clean out the applicator tips. Wish there was a better tool for this. Pipe cleaners have worked well enough, though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Easy to use last about 11 days. The longer you leave it on the longer it last. Not using lotions and hot water after a couple of days helps with depth of color. Very easy to use. I have very sensitive skin product gave me no problems. Different needle size give the design depth. Would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Cornbread

customer_reviews.title: Patchy and not consistent.
customer_reviews.text: I think that the batch I got might have been a little bit off or old. I left the ink on my skin for 60 minutes, rinsed it off, and the next day it was barely gray and very patchy. Worked on my fingers, but nowhere else. Kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kassablaze

customer_reviews.title: Looks Blue and Fades
customer_reviews.text: It's not a full one star, because the attachments were great, but the quality of the ink was poor - the better alternatives is the InkBox ink. The dispensary component of InkBox was better, it darkened and looks black. This does none of those things. It's hard to squeeze, it remains blue, and looks like a marker, and even if it was black, lasts nowhere close to 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: DIY
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to henna tattoo my eyebrows and it came out Wonderful... I was about to be charged $350 to have them done but decided to try it myself.. It lasted for about 2weeks but I know that now that I am familiar with the product that I can make it last twice as long
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rankins

customer_reviews.title: Recommend buying somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: The ink was not consistent and very watery in places, also the tips where not reusable and the instructions where very vague. Although the tattoo did last long I was unable to do anything too complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product, overpriced garbage.
customer_reviews.text: the package is super cheap like they throw all the items in the box loosely. they give you a pen a little roll of paper, a couple needles, and ONE tiny bottle of the ink. it stains really bad and last maybe like less than a week. you make a little mistake and wip it off? it stains. extremely disappointed. for the price I would recommend using a cheaper brand since its essentially the same exact thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Not real henna
customer_reviews.text: This is not real henna. And it was a little blotchy. Bought it for my daughter and it did not have distinct lines and was kind of blotchy when she used it.
customer_reviews.author: mmille

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what it was described as. Messy, not even close to being a temporary tatoo unless it means it comes off immediately
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: COOL
customer_reviews.text: I forgot to take a pic of the temp tat but it darkened up pretty well and lasted over a week. Neat and fun for kids
customer_reviews.author: ALKA

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is quite hard to squeeze so when I was doing a big tattoo my hand hurt during and after. Also I didn’t realize that the henna was black. But it’s perfect. I love it. Also there are no instructions for the deodorant, tracing paper or pen. Had to look on YouTube to see what it was used for
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Color dark and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: This product lives up to what it says. The color was dark and stayed on for at least 3 weeks. I will definitely buy again when I run out. Used it on kids 9 - 13 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk product. Extremely vague directions. Put the design on and waited two joirst. Washed it off and next morning, you could see it but extremely faded. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Works great! But...
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Stains well and lasts long enough for me. Easy to use. 4 stars because the final product looks black that fades and looks like a sharpie mark. If you like that, great. But in hind sight, I would have gotten actual henna. I'm not a fan of the color, but if you're into that, it does work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Brand

customer_reviews.title: Good ink
customer_reviews.text: Great ink , requires a steady hand and skill to draw (which I suck at ) but over all satisfied
customer_reviews.author: KZ customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a fun thing to use. The tattoo comes out nice and dark, it looks pretty real! I brought this on a vacay to visit family last year, they all wanted one! The needles get clogged if you let it dry, so make sure to clean them immediately. It's a good way to give your real tattoo ideas a test run too.
customer_reviews.author: sia

customer_reviews.title: Go traditional route
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a prison tattoo, no matter how long left on skin.
customer_reviews.author: BarryB1216

customer_reviews.title: Very light color
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but the color of the henna was very light. Wore off in a day.
customer_reviews.author: Working mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use look great
customer_reviews.text: Good product The kit is very handy and the results are exactly like a real tattoo!!
customer_reviews.author: Roi Peretz

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long while to come off. So be careful with your drawings.
customer_reviews.text: The ink was a little too blobby which made it difficult to draw any design. It also smeared way too easy, causing blotchy ink spots on skin.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: It's fun to free hand "tattoos" with easy ink. Takes a little bit to get used to the flow. It's also easier to draw on other people vs yourself. Stays on for a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.author: Jacob G.

customer_reviews.title: Some applicators missing.
customer_reviews.text: Description states 5 application needles included. I only received 3. The product does go on nicely and develops to a very dark color. Looks just like the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Can do a food amount of tattoos.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit, simple and endless possibilities if you have the skill and imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Cuthrell

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for!! I had purchased a similar product from another company for my daughter and it was good but Easy.ink is GREAT! It comes with different tips and tracing paper. The ink develops nicely and it lasts at least 2 weeks. We will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimee Ann Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Just awful
customer_reviews.text: Awful.0 gave it two tries and I'm wishing I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: T. Taha

customer_reviews.title: Use it for freehand
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift 13yrl old loves it did some free hand
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Came broken, so I couldn’t use it with the tips. I tried freehand but the ink is bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aya Torres

customer_reviews.title: It was a fun quarantine activity
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife did this together and gave each other tattoos. It was a fun thing to do while staying in the house. It’s a cool experience to be able to get a wild tattoo without the commitment! Only thing is that after one day, the ink turned blue instead of black, but still looked great,
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully if used correctly
customer_reviews.text: Loved using this product with my daughters. We loved it as had allot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabetta Aceto

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This worked exactly as I hoped it would! The ink stayed about a week before it started fading and looked real.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Waisted
customer_reviews.text: Hated the ink!!!!! It didn’t stay on I spent 30 minutes on the design and it washes of after waiting an hour
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Armenteros

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product has to stay on your skin for about 2 hours and even after younwash it off your "tattoo" isn't very visable. After about two days my tattoos wereally very pigmented and lasted for about a week or so. That being said I loved having the kit and the experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much, it comes woth everything you need and lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Greer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Ink is pre mixed and lasts a long time if stored correctly (in the freezer)! Purchased in December, just finishing up my bottle in April!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M

customer_reviews.title: The Ink looks so real
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son for his birthday party so they can do tattoos and they loved it
customer_reviews.author: stephanie perrone

customer_reviews.title: You can trust this seller
customer_reviews.text: My daughter Loved it!!! Super fast shipping!!! Highly recommend A++
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Jaen

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: One day use only, but looks nice and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: ola

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use a stencil
customer_reviews.text: The henna is great just free hand it . I used a stencil and it messed it up . This is 12hrs after i did my henna .
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Hit it heavy not for details
customer_reviews.text: Didnt dew well with small details and even leaving it heavy after 3hrs on and washing off didnt get much darker
customer_reviews.author: Daniel guadarrama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: kett

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work at all,no needles to insert the ink,it did not work at all for me,save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It lasted 5 weeks and it was amazing, it took a little over like 2 hours to dry so i wish it dried faster.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff!! It’s a very natural stain and lasts a decent amount of time for a great price! Great way to test out a tattoo design before getting the real thing
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Super small for the price hard to work with needs refill packs for this price
customer_reviews.author: Susan wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: I tried it a couple different times and different ways and it still never worked. So disappointed in this product because it would be really cool to try different tattoos
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Good price. Held up on skin well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This kit is awesome! My daughter (13) is learning more and more every day and designing beautiful henna for herself and her friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll be satisfied with product
customer_reviews.text: Drew butterfly on young girl and she loved it.very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Can cause allergies
customer_reviews.text: It is good, and it lasts long enough on the skin. but people with sensitive skin like me, I do not recommend using it, can cause allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Lisandra

customer_reviews.title: Coo
customer_reviews.text: This is cool, but you gotta be careful. Even when you mess up n take off before dry. It still appears lol
customer_reviews.author: Ona

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Was looking for something to test out my tattoo placements and such and this was just perfect. Really easy to use and great results too!
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This did NOT work! Followed the directions and you can hardly see the henna. It never darkened. Also there was no pen in my kit
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product but we barely did any designs and the bottle was empty. Got the 1oz. Couldn’t do much with it anymore
customer_reviews.author: Jin Young

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit for my niece for Christmas and she LOVES it! Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Blouch III

customer_reviews.title: Looks like you used a sharpie
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, it looked like i used a sharpie on my skin. Im so happy i tested it first!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality ! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit, I suggest checking their demo video. Tattoo looks good so far. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Delbeau

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all!! Washed it out after 3 hours and waited 24 hours, it still looks like in the picture. Won't have this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Pérez

customer_reviews.title: Favorite ink! I love how dark it is
customer_reviews.text: Favorite ink! I love how dark it is, the sharpness, and how it lasts so long. It's really easy to work with and fooled many to believe it's real 10/10
customer_reviews.author: roey

customer_reviews.title: The color, how it like it came out
customer_reviews.text: It was fine but when it came out the color wasn't dark it was more blueish than black it look was drawn on my hand
customer_reviews.author: Khang

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this to try as an alternative to henna tattoos. I followed the instructions and did a small skin test before a full tattoo. It was easy to use and I liked that the bottle came prefilled and ready to use. I watched a couple YouTube videos to make sure I knew how it worked. Initially, after washing it off, it’s very faint on the skin but over the next 24-48 hrs gets much darker. It is darker than regular henna so works well on tan or darker skin tones. My kids and I had fun playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: blueberry

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. The item came in in a flimsy box. Included one tube of ink, the needles, and bent up tracing paper. Also it included a wonderful Paper Mate ink pen! Notice the sarcasm. See the pictures below. I planned to give this as a gift, but I'm a bit embarrassed to do so. Oh, and instructions say that you have to avoid contact with anything for 48 hours. Really? Not worth the $20.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely fun but much harder to use than they claim; the application takes a lot of pressure squeezing the ink bottle consistently and if you’re not consistent the ink will bead up like a prison tattoo. Also the black ink is more green.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So this is after I applied the ink TWICE. The first time I left it on for 60 minutes, then the retraced (very difficult because it was so light) 48 hrs later. The second time I left the ink on 2 hrs! It is still very light and looks faded. It was difficult to use because there’s air in the bottle which makes applying it without “blobs” hard. Also the video shows you tracing images from electronics to use for transfer (well tracing from touch screen devices is a pain!) I ended up printing these words and then tracing. I will not buy again 😐
customer_reviews.author: momma__mandy

customer_reviews.title: Temporay Tattoo  WOW
customer_reviews.text: Easy.ink..... Just Wow way to go this was easy to use and stayed on for weeks. The first week it is a good color and the second week it starts to fade. The one I did on my hand only last a week but I wash dishes and you just wash your hand a lot so I don't recommend using it on your hand if you are wanting it to stay for a while. But if you just want it for about 3 or 4 days then go for it. I love this produced and have told others about it when they asked me if I got a new tattoo. Great product I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Betty G. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: I read it before buying and realized the size but was still slightly disappointed in the amount that came with it. HOWEVER, that's the only bad part. Kit was great and it really popped and lasted a long time after use. My teens loved it. We used it at a party and they all raved about it for weeks. Would recommend for short term and "trying out" a tattoo before committing. Get the largest size if you plan to do more than a few small things though. It goes fast.
customer_reviews.author: CL Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Fun to mess with.
customer_reviews.text: Getting to know the pressure needed and how to use transfer paper made this a ok first time buy.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: stains last about a week and a half on the hands, probably longer where washing doesn't happen as diligently
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Worked as described. I prefer the type of gel where the design is visible after the gel is removed. This will darken over several hours after gel is removed but there's nothing initially.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Easy to use and fun!
customer_reviews.text: So fun and easy to use. The results last for about two weeks and look awesome! Great for older kids, too. Smells lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Neometta

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great fun to make temp tattoos!!! Its better than putting something on permanent that you regret later!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Clement

customer_reviews.title: Great product does its job well
customer_reviews.text: Lasts 2 weeks on arms etc. a week on hands... cause of how much u wash them... especially these days.
customer_reviews.author: droid dude

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Product livs up to everything it said it would be! An amazing product please buy is you want a onth long all natural tattoo.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: You need to be confident in drawing or painting. It is all freehand. Definitely practice first.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Denke

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Pattern came out clean and stayed on for about a week. Fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hazelhippy

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy this product . I like that I can put a tattoo on before I actually do it for real.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several jagua blends and this is by far the best. Great value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Wittke

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t bother with it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it doesn’t work well. I didn’t like the smell either.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Wu

product_meta.title: Easy.ink - Freehand Ink, Premium Quality Temporary Tattoo Ink Full Kit, Natural & Long Lasting (Organic Jagua fruit Based Ink/Gel), No Added Chemicals. Black/Dark Blue. Semi-Permanent Tattoo Ink 1oz
feature_bullets: 100% real natural & organic fruit based ink. A Premium Temporary Tattoo Ink
Darker and more realistic stain - Looks just like a real tattoo
Extra Long Lasting - Lasts 7-14 days (or more)
Full temporary tattoo kit set - Has everything you need
